text: Bulkay hum ney enhen aur inn kay baap dadon ko zindagi kay saro saman diye yahan tak kay unn ki muddat-e-umar guzar gaee. Kiya woh nahi dekhtay kay hum zamin ko iss kay kinaron say ghatatay chalay aarahey hain abb kiya wohi ghalib hain?keh dijiye! Mein to tumhen Allah ki wahee kay zariye aagah ker raha hun magar behray log baat nahi suntay jabkay unhen aagah kiya jaye
